As an undergrad, I performed an experiment in which we fired beta particles (from a decaying radioactive element) into a magnetic field. By adjusting the field strength to get the electrons to hit the detector, we could determine the speed of the electrons. We did this for multiple beta sources that each ejected their electrons at different speeds.

None of them were moving at the speed of light.
